conclusion: Analyze forces acting on particle before and after removal of metal plate.
Particle P is stationary, net force is zero, qE = mg.
Distance between plates is d, metal plate thickness is l.
Electric field with metal plate is E = V/(d-l).
After removing metal plate, distance is d, new electric field E' = V/d.
Electric force after removal is F_electric = q(V/d).
Net force after removal is F_net = mg - q(V/d).
Using F = ma, acceleration a = g - qV/(md).
Substitute qV = mg(d-l) to find a = g(1 - (d-l)/d).
